description.html:
I’ve merged the code for ROS1 and ROS2 job generation. Now the ROS2 install jobs are being generated the same way that ROS1.

Tested: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_gazebo_ros_pkgs/585/console

Processing DSL script scripts/jenkins-scripts/dsl/gazebo_ros_pkgs.dsl
